original_text: If you buy an Israelite slave, he must work for you for six years. But in the seventh year he will become a free man. He can leave you. He does not have to pay you any money.
korean_text: 네가 히브리 종을 사면 그는 여섯 해 동안 섬길 것이요 일곱째 해에는 몸값을 물지 않고 나가 자유인이 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: If you buy an Israelite slave
he must work for you for six years
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 육 년 동안 너를 위해 일해야 한다

sentences.original_text: he will become a free man
He does not have to pay you any money
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너에게 아무 돈도 지불할 필요가 없다
